short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare ticket prices on Ticketmaster and StubHub to save up to 50% on event purchases. Use our tool to find cheaper tickets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save on purchasing tickets for concerts, sports, theater, and other events with EventikSaver. Compare ticket prices between Ticketmaster and Stubhub, and choose the best seats at the most affordable prices.

You probably know that the price for a ticket to the same seat can be sold at different prices on different ticket platforms. That is why we created this extension, so that you could easily compare ticket prices on different platforms, in particular, for now, we have implemented comparison for the 2 most popular platforms in the USA: Ticketmaster and Stubhub.

üíõ Instructions for using the extension (there is also a video in the description above)
1) Open the extension on the event page (Ticketmaster or Stubhub) that you want to attend.
2) Click on the "compare with Stubhub" or "compare with Ticketmaster" button.
3) Open the page of the found event.
4) Click on the extension on this page and choose the most optimal price and seat for you.

üíö How is the extension useful for you?
You will definitely save your money. If it is a popular event, the savings can reach hundreds of dollars.
You will see the entire range of prices across all sections. This will simplify the choice of your seat.
Ease of use. Just 4 clicks and you have saved your budget.

‚ù§Ô∏è We will be glad if our extension is useful to you.
